summary: The diff implements both requirements by modifying the FounderExpertiseSection component to display the two requested pilot partnership messages with MOBIUS-NOVA brand styling. All requested changes to section[5] elements are present in the implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added decorative visual elements including background gradient, horizontal line decoration, and decorative accent bar
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified only text content replacement ('Seeking first pilot installation partners' and 'Pre-commercial prototype stage â€” be among the first') with brand styling. The addition of background gradients, decorative lines, and accent bars was not requested in REQ-19 or REQ-20.
